channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Accessories by Kipling
channel.desc: Showcasing the fashionable and classic bags created by this international brand, including handbags, rucksacks, travel bags and weekend away bags.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Shay & Blue Boutique Fragrance
channel.desc: Established in 2012, Shay & Blue is an award-winning boutique perfumery based in London's Marylebone that brings a contemporary twist to artisan fragrance.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Seasonal Deals
channel.desc: Refresh your wardrobe with Ruth Langsford Seasonal Deals. Explore a hand-picked selection of stylish essentials, cosy layers and versatile pieces, all at fantastic prices.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Nakery Beauty
channel.desc: Nakery Beauty delivers clean, high-performance skincare and bodycare designed to empower confidence at every age.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Ideas with Shay & Blue
channel.desc: Featuring a wide spectrum of beauty gifts, from skincare to cosmetics, plus award-winning fragrance from Shay & Blue to inspire you to treat the ones you love.[(96057)]
